00013 class AcceptClientMsgService : public BasicAcceptService, public lsf::basic::Singleton<AcceptClientMsgService> {
00014 public:
00015     struct SockInfo {
00016         lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket;
00017         msg::ConnHead conn_head;
00018         uint64_t last_heart_beat_time = 0;
00019     };
00020     using sock_map_type = std::unordered_map<int, SockInfo>;
00021     static const size_t DEF_HEART_BEAT_INTERVAL = 10*1000;
00022     static const size_t DEF_HEART_BEAT_TIMEOUT = 15*1000;
00023 
00024     AcceptClientMsgService() : BasicAcceptService(conf::SERVICE_TYPE_CLIENT_MSG) {}
00025     bool SendMessageToClient(msg::CS& message);
00026 
00027 protected:
00028     virtual bool OnRun();
00029     virtual void OnConnectionCreate(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00030     virtual void OnConnectionMessage(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, std::string& message);
00031     virtual void OnConnectionClose(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00032     virtual void OnConnectionPeerClose(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00033 
00034     void HandleLogin(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, msg::CS& message);
00035     void HandleHeartBeat(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, msg::CS& message);
00036     void HandleTimeSync(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, msg::CS& message);
00037     void HandleOther(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, msg::CS& message);
00038 
00039 protected:
